title: The Challenged

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Anyone who visits you will challenge you to a game of rock paper scissors. If you win, they will be dealt a powerful attack and their ability will fail against you for the rest of the game. If they win, they gain powerful defense for that night.
- People cannot challenge you two nights in a row.
- __**Part of the Daily Streak Faction**__

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have at least a 50% win rate at the end of the game (you can win while dead).

desc:
Post 4902
*I didn't sign up for this...*
